#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int x;
	cin >> x;
	if (x == 0) {
		cout << "1" << endl;
	} else {
		if (x == 1) {
			cout << "0" << endl;
		}
		else if (x&1) {
			int t = x/2;
			cout << "4";
			for (int i = 0; i < t; i++) {
				cout << "8";
			}
			cout << endl;
		} else {
			int t = x/2;
			for (int i  =0; i < t; i++) {
				cout << "8";
			}
			cout << endl;
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
